welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shchelkovo, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We're thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Kinza
restaurants.description: Kinza is a café located in Щёлково.

restaurants.name: Традиции вкуса
restaurants.description: Традиции вкуса is a pizzeria located in Щёлково.

restaurants.name: Глобус
restaurants.description: Глобус is a bakery located in Щёлково.

restaurants.name: Солнце Италии
restaurants.description: Солнце Италии is a italian restaurant located in Shchyolkovo.

restaurants.name: Ресторан «Глобус»
restaurants.description: Ресторан «Глобус» is a restaurant located in Щёлково.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, mainly serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and entering their email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zhukovsky International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zhukovsky International Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'ZIA Free WiFi' from the list of available networks.
